text:
~Mvi ma#ddhyaqma(gg) Sra#thAya | 
athA# vaqyamA#ditya vraqtE tavAnA#gasOq adi#tayE syAma || 
A tvA#&hAr.Sha-maqntara#BUd^^rdhruqvastiqShThA &vi#cAcaliH | 
viSa#stvAq sarvA# vA~jCantvaqsmin rAqShTramadhi# Sraya ||
agnE# bRuqhannuqShasA#mUqd^^rdhvO a#sthAnnirjagmiqvAn-tama#sOq jyOtiqShA&&gA$t | 
aqgnirBAqnunAq ruSa#tAq sva~ggaq A jAqtO viSvAq sadmA$nyaprAH || 
sIdaq tvaM mAqturaqsyA - [  ] 4
